decision_conditions: This application grants retrospective consent for a Site Restoration Scheme of land at the ZC Overhead Line Diversion, within the Colne Valley where HS2 crosses the National Grid existing ZC overhead line in span ZC45-46 on a proposed viaduct, in accordance with Paragraph 5 (1) of Schedule 16 to the High Speed Rail (London - West Midlands) Act 2017.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: COLNE VALLEY VIADUCT, WETLANDS ECOLOGICAL MITIGATION SITE
description: Request for agreement of a Site Restoration Scheme of land at the ZC Overhead Line Diversion, within the Colne Valley where HS2 crosses the National Grid existing ZC overhead line in span ZC45-46 on a proposed viaduct, in accordance with Paragraph 5 (1) of Schedule 16 to the High Speed Rail (London - West Midlands) Act 2017.
